text: Brec Marie Bassinger (born May 25, 1999) is an American actress. She is known for her roles as Emma in the Nickelodeon series The Haunted Hathaways, Bella Dawson in the Nickelodeon series Bella and the Bulldogs and as Courtney Whitmore / Stargirl in the superhero television series Stargirl. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Texas
title: Brec Bassinger
